message.content:
cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.SOC, cs.MA, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper deals with targeted viral marketing on social networks, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
2. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes an efficient approximation algorithm for the problem, which is a core topic in this sub-category.
3. cs.SOC (Computational Social Science) - The paper deals with social networks and their analysis, which is a key area of research in this sub-category.
4. cs.MA (Multiagent Systems) - The paper deals with the problem of influencing a group of agents (users) to adopt a product or idea, which is a topic of interest in this sub-category.
5. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes an algorithm for a problem related to marketing, which can be considered as a sub-topic of AI.
